messages.pwd_confirm: Confirm new password do not match

self_evaluation.header:
Please do self-evaluations 
in order to get feel good scores.

draft_saved.body:
You can take time to think and finish it 
at any time in your Feel Good Tools.

evaluation_saved.header:
Your feel good scores 
have been updated accordingly.
evaluation_saved.body:
You can go to the Scores page to 
see the change.

signup_success.body:
Welcome to your space! 

 You can now self-evaluate everything in your life. Satisfaction scores will be calculated and updated 
 in real time following your evaluations.

delete_account.body: We hope that you will be back soon.

specific.body: Mention at least one of the answers to: who - what - when - where.

measurable.body: Include a progress milestone (it's OK if it's a small one).

achievable.body: Set up a realistically doable action.

relevant.body: The action should be in line with your priorities.

time_based.body: Set a deadline to motivate you.

smart.footer: And finally, begin your action with a verb!

welcome.paragraph:
Find out what you need,
 and also what you don't

level and moods.

description.other:
Any other aspect that modifies
my vitality and spirit

header.title: Your Feel Good Level
header.body: The scores you gave during self-assesment are used to calculate an average fell good score.

subtitle.good: Factors that are on good track, keep going in this direction!
subtitle.normal: Ask yourself "How can I minimize the negative sides?" and change as priority 2
subtitle.bad: Ask yourself "WHY ?" and change as priority 1. You may need help from professionals to get out of the situation.

who gave you negative waves?
